title: Character
description: A player or non player character within an setting. Non Player characters are defined by not being attached to a user

name.description: The chosen name for this character

description.description: A public description of this character visable for al users with acces to the character. DO NOT USE FOR PRIVET BACKGROUNDS

background.description: The background of a character, usualy this should only be available to players and game masters
background.example: Jack isnâ€™t much of a sea faring pirate, sea fearing would be more appropriate. Ever since getting the black mark jack has gone out of its way not to leave shore.

notice.description: Anything out of the ordenarry that the system noticed automaticly

card.description: The character card as a nice markdown table

events.description: All the events that this characters has subscribed to

skills.description: All the skills that this characters posses

conditions.description: All the conditions that apply to this character

type.description: Whether this character is a player character, setting this to false wil turn the character to a non player character (NPC)

approved.description: Whether this character is a approved by a game master,setting this to approved wil make the character playable on events
